title: Husband cheats on her, can she ask for divorce? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: sister says her husband cheats on her and she has a boy from him he confessed three times and she doesn't love him anymore and what what can she do is she advised to seek divorce if it is proven and the boy confessed that he threw out her one-year marriage or 10 months marriage he used to cheat on her and and commit zina she has all the right to ask for divorce if she sees that their marriage is going to a dead end
